title: pregnant woman: light skin tone

adjectives: Carrying developing offspring within the body.
Carrying developing offspring within the body or being about to produce new life
nouns: The normal location for a pregnancy to occur
Gestation is the carrying of an embryo or fetus inside female viviparous animals.
The condition of being pregnant; the period from conception to birth when a woman carries a developing fetus in her uterus.
The state of being pregnant; the period from conception to birth when a woman carries a developing fetus in her uterus
The state of being pregnant; pregnancy.
Carrying of an embryo or fetus inside a female viviparous animal
Pregnancy is the common name for gestation in humans.
A woman is a female human.
An animal of the sex that produces eggs.
An adult human member of the sex that produces ova and bears young.
An adult female person (as opposed to a man)

description: This version of the  Pregnant Woman emoji has the  Light Skin Tone applied, which is displayed as a Pale Skin Tone on supported platform
apple_vendor_description: This emoji on Apple devices portrays a pregnant woman with a gentle, serene expression, emphasizing the beauty and anticipation of new life. Her form is rendered with Apple's hallmark soft rounded edges and realistic lighting, showcasing a subtle 3D depth that highlights her rounded belly. The light skin tone is depicted with natural shading, and the overall design, with its smooth gradients, conveys a sense of warmth, hope, and the profound journey of pregnancy, often used to share personal news or express empathy.
